description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, specifying several pure virtual methods for handling different event types related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change events.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class with pure virtual methods for handling various events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle runtime manager events with data passed as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle window manager events with data passed as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handle ripple events with a string name and associated data as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handle state change events with data passed as a JsonObject reference.
